Comment: Not really a plot twist. That is the [Dead Internet Theory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dead_Internet_theory). Though Wikipedia claims this is a conspiracy theory, that's a weird characterization. It is not a theory in the classical sense but more of an observation about the ever increasing frequency that bots are interacting with bots.

Comment: I actually deleted my previous Reddit account and stopped using the site for ~2 years because I got so sick of the bot problem.
